<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset=utf-8>
		<style type='text/css'>
			table {
				border-collapse: collapse;
				width:100%;
			}
			th,td {
				font-family: monospace;
				font-size: 2.25em;
				border: 5px solid #555;
				padding: 10px;
			}
			th:nth-child(1),th:nth-child(2) {
				text-align: left;
			}
			th:nth-child(3),td:nth-child(3) {
				text-align: center;
			}
			th:nth-child(4),td:nth-child(4) {
				text-align: right;
			}
		</style>
